      • getLong

        public static java.lang.Long getLong(JSONObject jsonObject,
                                     java.lang.String key,
                                     java.lang.Long defaultValue)
                              throws JSONException
        Get Long from JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - -JSONObject.
        key - -String key.
        defaultValue - -Long default value if json object is null.
        Returns:
        • if jsonObject is null, return defaultValue
        • if key is null or empty, return defaultValue
        • if JSONObject#getLong(String) exception, return defaultValue
        • return JSONObject#getLong(String)
        Throws:
        JSONException

      • getJSONObjectCascade

        public static JSONObject getJSONObjectCascade(JSONObject jsonObject,
                                              JSONObject defaultValue,
                                              java.lang.String... keyArray)
                                       throws JSONException
        Get JSONObject from JSONObject by traversing.
        Traverse the given json object to find corresponding json object for the provided key.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - -JSONObject.
        defaultValue - -JSONObject.
        keyArray - -variable length String argument.
        Returns:
        • if jsonObject is null, return defaultValue
        • if keyArray is null or empty, return defaultValue
        • get getJSONObject(JSONObject, String, JSONObject) by recursion, return it. if anyone is null, return directly
        Throws:
        JSONException
        See Also:
        #getJSONObject(JSONObject, String, JSONObject)}.

      • getJSONObjectCascade

        public static JSONObject getJSONObjectCascade(java.lang.String jsonData,
                                              JSONObject defaultValue,
                                              java.lang.String... keyArray)
                                       throws JSONException
        Get JSONObject from String json data.
        Traverse the given json object to find corresponding json object for the provided key.
        Parameters:
        jsonData - -String.
        defaultValue - -JSONObject.
        keyArray - -variable length String argument.
        Returns:
        • if jsonData is null, return defaultValue
        • if keyArray is null or empty, return defaultValue
        • get getJSONObject(JSONObject, String, JSONObject) by recursion, return it. if anyone is null, return directly
        Throws:
        JSONException
        See Also:
        #getJSONObject(JSONObject, String, JSONObject)}., #getJSONObjectCascade(JSONObject, JSONObject, String...)}.

      • parseKeyAndValueToMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseKeyAndValueToMap(JSONObject jsonObject)
                                                                              throws JSONException
        Get from JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - -JSONObject.
        Returns:
        • if sourceObj is null, return null
        • else parse entry by MapUtils#putMapNotEmptyKey(Map, String, String) one by one
        Throws:
        JSONException
